alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Jefferson; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:55AM CDT until April 20 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in northeastern Kansas... Northeastern Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 255 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meriden, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valley Falls, Meriden, Hoyt, Ozawkie, Nortonville, Winchester and Perry Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
